soso.music.info.name: Track: %1$s《%2$s》
soso.string.0: Deposit the elements you hold into the team storage.
soso.string.1: Withdraw shared elements from the team storage.
soso.string.6: Shift+Left Click to select an object
soso.string.17: You can only deposit coins; withdrawals are disabled.
soso.string.28: The sewers are where many criminals handle “black goods,” including bodies. Those brutally murdered became undead. Defeat 10 Sewer Cadavers in the sewers.
soso.string.33: Bandits in the Mengteng Mountain Range attack passersby, causing serious harm to caravans. They seem to have clear job divisions—defeat 15 swordsmen to protect the trade route.
soso.string.37: There are many spiders wandering in the sewers; the most numerous are the Demonized Spiders. Having absorbed forest miasma, they have grown huge and pose a great threat. Defeat 15 Demonized Spiders entrenched in the sewers.
soso.string.39: As a newly opened resettlement area, the Soul-Reaving Black Beast is too dangerous. It is the leader of monster packs in the desert; despite its massive body it vanishes without a trace. Defeat 1 Soul-Reaving Black Beast to prepare for future development.
soso.string.45: A powerful treant lurks in the camp ruined by the Sacred Tree’s curse; the way it swings its axe is as terrifying as a war fiend. Defeat the Soul-Eroding Treant and free the camp.
soso.string.50: Bandits in the Mengteng Mountain Range attack passersby, causing serious harm to caravans. They seem to have clear job divisions—defeat 15 crossbowmen to protect the trade route.
soso.string.52: The fate of ordinary humans infected by the Sacred Tree’s curse: their bodies become treants and their minds are altered by hatred. Defeat 15 Berserk Treants and set them free.
soso.string.57: Absorbing a huge amount of the Sacred Tree’s magic distorted and enlarged their bodies; their eyes grew dim, yet they can listen to the earth—twisted, alien beings. Defeat 5 Giant Guardian Treants and set them free.
soso.string.59: They curse to kill every enemy they see. Is this resentment toward the demonkin, or toward themselves who developed the art that turns one into a monster? ...Defeat 7 Cursed Grudge Treant ─ Hex-Killers with strong curse power.
soso.string.64: The overbearing garrison legion has frightened villagers into not daring to go outside. Their burly shield guards are especially fearsome. Defeat 8 garrison shield guards to let villagers know they’re not a big deal.
soso.string.68: Lost practitioners made curse power run wild... archers steeped in curses turned into trees... they fire arrows using blood as a curse and strike all who approach. Defeat ten Grudgewood Statues blocking the road to prepare to head to the Eroded Dragon!
soso.string.73: A monster born from the corpse of one who trained fire arts to the extreme. Subjugate the Flame-Entwined Treant that appears deep in the Eastern Deep Forest.
soso.string.78: The overbearing garrison uses village resources without restraint; among them, the greatsword soldiers have the strongest offense. Defeat 8 garrison greatsword soldiers to let them know the villagers are not to be trifled with.
soso.string.80: The Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar—built by the Church of the Sacred Tree—is a giant altar. Its central system—the Sanctuary Mechanism—has run amok and lost its proper management functions. Defeat it and reboot it to assist altar management.
soso.string.85: As a newly opened resettlement area, Soulfiend Remains are too dangerous. Wielding death-poison arrows, they ambush travelers in sandstorms. Defeat 7 Soulfiend Remains in the desert to prepare for future development.
soso.string.90: The great tree of faith, like a mother, has been polluted; enraged spirits vent their fury and take on more aggressive forms... yet they can no longer tell who the true enemy is... Defeat 5 High-Rank Spirits to free the sanctuary!
soso.string.94: As a newly opened resettlement area, the Mirage Desert Boar is too dangerous; no matter how you flee, you end up back at it. Defeat 4 Mirage Desert Boars in the desert to prepare for future development.
soso.string.96: Although there are many bad rumors about the garrison, no evidence is found—because sentries handle the perimeter watch. Defeat 4 garrison sentries to reduce their target-locking ability.
soso.string.98: Large numbers of undead have surged in Hafors Village; even skeletal sentries have revived to serve as its guards. Please defeat 7 Hafors Guards to weaken enemy defenses.
soso.string.102: As a newly opened resettlement area, the Death Desert Fox is too dangerous; hiding in the sands, it pierces unwary travelers with fangs. Defeat 15 Death Desert Foxes in the desert to prepare for future development.
soso.string.104: There are rumors of sightings of the Sixth Demon General, “Ape General,” in the sewers. A very powerful demonkin; a famed flame magus who burned thousands of lives in the war. Though it’s only a rumor, there will be a heavy reward if you can subjugate him.
soso.string.108: As a newly opened resettlement area, the Deathland Poison Bee is too dangerous; its heavy stinger can pierce travelers’ gear and deliver deadly venom. Defeat 15 Deathland Poison Bees in the desert to prepare for future development.
soso.string.110: They stare at the world with hollow eyes and spill cold laughter from their mouths—is this scorn toward the demonkin, or toward themselves? Defeat 7 Mocking Treant ─ Eagle-Eye Soldiers who wield magic bows.
soso.string.112: The sewers are a trading ground for many criminals; the notorious Silver Wolf Bandits also appear here. Defeat 10 Silver Wolf Bandits ─ Assassins.
soso.string.114: The strongest beast in the Mengteng Mountain Range—the Silver Bear—harms caravans even more than the bandits due to its ferocity. Defeat 1 Silver Bear to protect the trade route.
soso.string.118: Offering beasts eroded by curses—withered and sallow, yet made robust and tenacious by the very curse. Subjugate 15 Wood-Eroded Offering Beasts that became undead monsters in the cursed Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar to free the sanctuary.
soso.string.120: A magic insect born of curse power—forever gnawing at the Sacred Tree without ever knowing what a belly is; even humans become their prey. Advance... do not bow to the violence of numbers—defeat twenty Tree-Boring Curse Insects!
soso.string.122: Large numbers of undead have surged in Hafors Village; the most numerous are Hafors Farmers—zombies. Please defeat 20 Hafors Farmers to prevent the town from being overrun.
soso.string.124: Wolves appear in packs in the Mengteng Mountain Range; when numerous they even attack passersby. Defeat 20 Silver Wolves to keep the trade route clear.
soso.string.126: Red bees are not natural creatures but magical beings created by sorcery; they siphon the Sacred Tree’s life force and spread curses. Defeat 10 Sap Red Bees to free the sanctuary.
soso.string.128: Villagers have nightmares every night—surely the work of the overbearing garrison’s sealcaster. Defeat 4 garrison sealcaster so villagers can sleep in peace.
soso.string.130: Vast magic makes them neither human nor other; stooped posture seems ancient, yet they brim with vitality—eyes fixed on the foe. Defeat 5 Chanting Treants to open the road to the main camp.
soso.string.132: A great many undead surge up from deep beneath the Sacred Tree. Evilsteel Rot-Zombies are warriors reborn as zombies, clad in fine mithril armor that deflects most attacks. Defeat 15 of these hard-to-subjugate Evilsteel Rot-Zombies and save Sno.
soso.string.137: The bandit chief lurking in the Mengteng Mountain Range; beyond a strong physique, he wields great magical power. Both caravans and the fortress city have heavy bounties on him. Defeat him to secure peace along the trade route.
soso.string.139: Demonkin have appeared in Hafors Village—possessing strength, intelligence, and cruelty, they are extremely dangerous to humans. Please defeat one demonkin to advance the village’s restoration.
soso.string.141: A monster—an avatar of the lord who holds absolute control over curses—has seized the Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar and spreads a hateful curse. Though its fury is aimed at the demonkin, many innocents are caught up in it. Defeat the Savage Tree Lord and free the sanctuary!
soso.string.146: Many spiders wander the sewers; the most dangerous are the Bewitching Spiders. Their alluring shell patterns carry magic that prevents escape. Defeat 4 Bewitching Spiders circling in the sewers.
soso.string.148: Warrior treants whose savagery has been maximally provoked by curses; they guard every bend of the holy altar to block intruders. Defeat 15 Rampaging Treants to free the sanctuary.
soso.string.150: The overbearing garrison is conducting bizarre research—revival... reanimation? In any case, nothing good. Defeat their experimental product: the Soulwood Bonebound.
soso.string.155: Shields once raised to protect humans are now borne by monsters—because they themselves have become monsters. Defeat 15 Brutal Treant ─ Tower Shield Soldiers who have lost reason.
soso.string.157: Forest Demon Wolves are the mightiest fighters in the Eastern Deep Forest; their howls crush magic and their pelts turn blades. Hunt 20 Forest Demon Wolves to protect passersby.
soso.string.159: Creatures in Hafors Village have mutated; tame livestock have turned into ferocious beasts. Please defeat 7 Sacred-Tree Parasite Boars to restore order.
soso.string.161: The Sacred Tree’s familiars—the Sanctuary Treants—were tainted by polluted magic and transformed into wrathful wraiths that endanger all life. Defeat 15 Sanctuary Wraiths to assist altar management.
soso.string.166: Beasts offered to the Sacred Tree and its familiars in prayers for safety—offering boars—went feral because the altar was left unmanaged and now run rampant. Defeat 15 Sanctuary Offering Beasts to assist altar management.
soso.string.168: The Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar... a huge altar built by the Church of the Sacred Tree... has a defense system designed to repel intruders. It seems to have been activated by the refugees’ disturbance. Defeat 4 Sanctuary Guardian Statues to assist altar management.
soso.string.170: A great many undead surge up from deep beneath the Sacred Tree. Among them is a terrifying zombie wielding sword and staff—rumored to be the zombified former pontiff of the Church of the Sacred Tree. Defeat him and save Sno.
soso.string.175: Do they harbor fear of the demonkin?... or hatred for the demonkin... or a lofty sense of duty to defend the nation? Defeat 20 Abyss Treant ─ Demon Sword Soldiers who would start a war even at the cost of becoming monsters.
soso.string.177: Shamans who helped the lord curse the great tree... Though their bodies suffer backlash from sorcery, they still keep human form—proof of their power. Defeat 4 Armored Tree Shamans to punish those who cast the curse!
soso.string.179: Warped magic triggered abnormalities in the Sacred Tree. These cubes gnaw at its root network, turn its sap into bodies, and plunder its blessing. Defeat 20 Brownwood Cubes to stop the plunder of the Sacred Tree.
soso.string.181: Many spiders prowl the sewers; the most troublesome is the Flame Spider. Their attacks inflict burning that’s hard to extinguish even in water. Defeat 8 Flame Spiders entrenched in the sewers.
soso.string.183: Native spiderlings that dwell on the Sacred Tree, but the curse has made them vicious and cruel. They ambush those who hunt the Eroded Dragon. Defeat 15 Miasma Poison Tree Spiders to prepare for the climb to the treetop!
soso.string.185: A great many undead surge from deep beneath the Sacred Tree. Demon-Toxin Young Zombies are abnormal—small yet unbelievably strong. Underestimating them has cost many lives. Defeat 15 Demon-Toxin Young Zombies and save Sno.
soso.string.187: The lost practitioners let curse power run wild... Warriors steeped in curses become even more aberrant, their sanity completely gone. Defeat 10 Evil-Tree Chasers guarding the Eroded Dragon to open a path to its lair!
soso.string.189: An original undead twisted and altered from the corpse of the Empire’s guardian dragon. The sorcerer’s power alone could not fully revive it, so it craves life... and devours the Sacred Tree. Now that the caster is dead, it has broken free... and will consume everything in the world! You who accept this quest... may you slay it—and save the world!
soso.string.194: A great many undead surge from deep beneath the Sacred Tree. Calamity Silverbones are gatekeepers reborn as skeletons; they wield deceptive archery that leaves targets unable to react. Defeat 7 Calamity Silverbones and save Sno.
soso.string.196: Since ancient times, the Lost Forest has been used to exile criminals. Lost within it, they became exiles and set upon endless wandering. Defeat 4 Lost Exiles to assist altar management.
soso.string.198: Treants that control giant bees to steal the Sacred Tree’s life force; they soar through the sky casting vicious curses. Defeat 10 Flying-Curse Treants to free the sanctuary.
soso.string.200: A great many undead surge from deep beneath the Sacred Tree. Foul Bonecallers—wielding staves to cast vicious curses—can even rouse other undead, and are key targets. Defeat 4 Foul Bonecallers and save Sno.
soso.string.204: Demonkin do exist in Hafors Village; there seems to be little buffer time left. Set out back to Sno Village and report to Captain Reig.
soso.string.207: The “Rooted Deep-Cavern” purification plan is fully prepared. Head to the very bottom with the guard unit and complete the purification operation.
soso.string.208: Rendezvous with the warrior Duanxian in Hafors Village and hear their findings from the on-site investigation.
soso.string.211: Your guard work is getting on track; at this time Reig’s dispatch informs you to go see him.
soso.string.214: Gather the bare minimum of supplies... cross the battlefield quickly and return to Banena. Biaosu’s appearance on the battlefield is unusual. Collect “10 Mithril Ingots” and hand them to Wange; there’s likely not much time left.
soso.string.217: The garrison legion will depart from Seimen, cross the Mengteng Mountain Range, and head to Sno—follow them back to Sno.
soso.string.218: The operation failed—despite everything going smoothly, it still failed. You and the subjugation squad break through the zombies’ encirclement. Check that Yanchi, who escaped with you, is safe.
soso.string.219: It is almost time for the garrison to depart. Return to the city of Seimen and meet the lord, Lanwang, to complete Sno’s courier mission.
soso.string.220: While waiting for the Green-Soul Stones, Yuanchuan hopes to secure supplies obtainable only within human society to support the front. Find Wange and confirm the collected supplies.
soso.string.223: Defeat the mutant creatures that appear deep in the Withered-Soul Desert. Chase after Taixin—who ran off excitedly after collecting fresh Green-Soul ore—and return to camp...
soso.string.226: With the full set of uniforms ready, it is time to infiltrate the depths of the base. Find the map... using a more forceful method is acceptable if needed!
soso.string.227: Deliver the supplies through the Eastern Deep Forest to Yuanchuan, who is waiting at the Banena camp. A large quantity of recovery potions and military goods will decide the outcome.
soso.string.230: From Duanxian you learn... Yanchi was taken into the depths of the Ye'erte camp. Enter the depths of the travel camp again and search for Yanchi in the jail...
soso.string.231: Even after collecting all processing materials, Taixin still seems to want something...
soso.string.232: For the garrison to pass the Mengteng Mountain Range smoothly, the mountain’s threats must be cleared. You dealt with the Silver Bear; next is the Silver Wolf Bandit Group. Defeat Shunchang and free the range.
soso.string.235: Travel with Yanchi and Reig, following the footsteps of Cardon and Wange who set out ahead, only to find them halted in the Lost Forest. Talk to them and confirm the reason...
soso.string.236: Head to the “Tree-Eroded Ancient City” to gather the last missing key-word; Yanchi will accompany you.
soso.string.237: To craft Green-Soul Curse Beads, ordinary Green-Soul ore pieces are not large enough. Taixin decides to go with you to the Withered-Soul Desert to collect Green-Soul ore.
soso.string.238: As you receive the Green-Soul Sword, officers burst in and seized Zhonghua. To you, he left only a calm line: “Lanwang ordered that you go hear the reply.”
soso.string.241:
To prevent the impending war and obtain the Green-Soul Stone, you must slip through this secret path to the deepest area—there, a Demon General awaits.

Proceed.
soso.string.244: The spirits enshrined in the Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar do not seem to welcome you. Follow Yanchi inside and investigate...
soso.string.245: To eliminate any lingering risk of the ritual failing, infiltrate the depths of the garrison camp again and defeat the Demon Lord!
soso.string.246: Yanchi proposed a hypothesis about the demonkin’s power and decided to test it. Protect Yanchi and defeat the demonkin.
soso.string.247: The undead den, the “Tree-Eroded Ancient City,” presents strange sights that greatly interest Yanchi. Bring what you saw back to Yanchi.
soso.string.248: To gather intel, you and Cardon and Wange split up to head into the Ye'erte camp. The camp is overrun by chaotic roots—an abandoned place unfit for living. As you enter, you discover...
soso.string.249: Hold the ritual once more... however hard it is, there is no other path... To do so, head again to the demonkin camp, Banena... Speak with Cardon hesitating at the entrance to the Mengteng Mountain Range.
soso.string.250: With the town’s crisis lifted, you accept Yanchi’s proposal—feign ignorance of what lies behind it and play the hero who slew the demonkin. Speak with Reig.
soso.string.251: For the garrison to pass the Mengteng Mountain Range smoothly, the mountain’s threats must be cleared. The Silver Bear—appearing about the same time as the Silver Wolf bandits—is brutal and obeys no one. Defeat it and clear the way for the army.
soso.string.252: The fierce subjugation operation begins. Imperial forces assault the Ye'erte camp eroded by the great tree. Meet Yanchi in the stone cells and take down the enemy commander, Biaosu...
soso.string.253: As a mercenary long active on the front, head to the town beneath the tree—Sno. It is said to be a prosperous place; to settle in smoothly, you only need to pass the enlistment test!
soso.string.254: At this rate, Sno will fall. As for the source of the demonkin’s mysterious power, ask someone who might know.
soso.string.255: Even with three people combined, you still cannot harm the powerful demonkin. Discuss next steps with Reig.
soso.string.256: After defeating the demonkin, Sno’s crisis should be over—but Yanchi looks worried. Ask him why.
soso.string.257: To craft the Green-Soul Curse Bead, Taixin needs special materials for processing. Help him collect “Devour-Fox Sharp Fang ×14、Death-Domain Keen Honey ×3、Dead-Soul Branch ×3.”
soso.string.258: Meet up with Captain Reig and the warrior Duanxian in Hafors Village and subjugate the “demonkin” with all three surviving.
soso.string.259: Using the Silver Wolf bandits’ secret route, you crossed the Mengteng Mountain Range, but the way was full of Lanwang’s private troops—treant monsters. In the end, Wange led the three of you into a house in Sno. Speak with Wange there.
soso.string.260: Before reinforcements outside the altar arrive... head to the top of the altar. Lanwang and the Eroded Dragon are likely up there. Defeat them and perform the ritual—then everything will come to an end...
soso.string.261: Step forward—the way ahead is already clear in your mind.
soso.string.262: On your second infiltration into the camp’s depths, you found Yanchi locked in the stone cells. To learn about the enemy’s power, Yanchi chose to stay at risk. Return to find Reig and report...
soso.string.263: Captain Reig also escaped from the undead. Though scarred, he has not yielded to setbacks and is issuing orders to the others. Confirm the next mission with him.
soso.string.266: The world is peaceful for now—you will pass the day safely, return to base to tidy gear... stroll the town... buy supplies. Who knows what tomorrow may bring.
soso.string.268: After dealing with the Silver Wolf remnants, you finally returned to Sno. Meet the garrison commander, Biaosu, quartered at the inn, and complete your last task as Sno’s courier.
soso.string.269: This hidden entrance lets you slip into the tree altar, but against Lanwang—who gained great power by eroding the Sacred Tree with curses—a surprise attack is unlikely to end it. Aim to destroy the gate and sever communication between the inside and outside of the altar.
soso.string.270: Everyone scatters through the Lost Forest to find the refugees and ask them for another route to the Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar. Note... do not talk with them too much. Report the location to Reig afterward.
soso.string.271: You have one of the two keys to reach the Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar—the gate’s key-word. To obtain the other, you and Yanchi decide to contact Biaosu. Head to the Imperial garrison camp in Sno.
soso.string.274: With Lanwang—the one who cursed the Sacred Tree—defeated, the end draws near. A dramatic change erupts upon the ritual stage of the Holy Holy Spirit Tree Altar...
soso.string.277: Complete the Epic—Prelude 【Tutorial Area】Sacred Tree Journey!
soso.string.278: You encountered danger in the camp and were saved by Reig. It seems he has more to say to you afterward.
soso.string.279: Break through the forces Lanwang deployed in the Mengteng Mountain Range and reach Seimen; helpers there can assist you in getting to Banena.
soso.string.280: To make up for shortages in the “Rooted Deep-Cavern” purification plan, Captain Reig orders you to deliver potion materials to Yanchi, priest of the Church of the Sacred Tree. Nervous about your first contact with the North’s largest church, you set out.
soso.string.281: Did they foresee you would return to Seimen—or was it for another purpose...? Passing through the Mengteng Mountain Range, controlled by overwhelming force, you arrived at Seimen. To reach Banena, look for the Silver Wolf bandits’ inside contact in Seimen—Wange.
soso.string.282: Garrison commander Biaosu has many complaints about Sno’s guard and demands you quickly come to the inn to hear his requests as intermediary.
soso.string.283: Having cleared the march’s obstacles, report to Lanwang.
soso.string.284: Due to the unexpected encounter and battle with Biaosu, the supplies could not be delivered to Banena. Talk with Wange and Cardon and decide on the plan going forward.
soso.string.285: Shaking off the garrison’s pursuers... you rendezvous with Yanchi, who set out earlier. How should you traverse the Lost Forest next...?
soso.string.286: By chance you rejoined Reig and escaped danger. Exchange what you have learned during your time apart...
soso.string.287: From Taixin you learn Yuanchuan seems to have something to tell you. While waiting for the Green-Soul Curse Bead to be completed, report to Yuanchuan first.
soso.string.288: With the letter successfully protected, you arrived at the fortress city, Seimen. Next you must deliver it to the old lord, Lanwang. Rumor says he was the frontline commander in the Human-Demon War, a living hero in his eighties; his indifference to formalities puts you at ease.
soso.string.289: But at the end of the ritual, you were obstructed... Discuss the next move with Cardon outside the altar.
soso.string.290: Destroying the gate smoothly severed the boundary between the altar and the 【Orthodox Path】 within and without. Rejoin Cardon outside and secure a smooth retreat route.
soso.string.291: You returned with the Lost Forest map. With the map in hand, meet Yanchi and discuss the next step; what you saw in the camp remains too unclear.
soso.string.292: The world has quieted again and your efforts were rewarded. Talk with the friends waiting to greet you at the tree’s foot.
soso.string.293: After a few days, Captain Reig finally reorganized the guard, then suddenly summoned you. Talk with Reig and ask about work.
soso.string.294: Having passed the enlistment test, you return to Reig. What will you receive there?
soso.string.295: Garrison commander Biaosu demands that Reig go to the “Tree-Eroded Ancient City” for a show of force. Will things go as he wishes?
soso.string.296: After escaping the pursuers, you returned to Sno. Soon you received notice relayed by Reig: Biaosu summons you...
soso.string.297: Skirting the Sacred Tree’s roots, the nearby village—Hafors—fell under a fierce undead assault. Confirm what happened with Hafors’s priest, Cardon.
soso.string.298: Even together with Yanchi and Reig, you could not defeat Lanwang... Perhaps the time has come. Use all your strength to bring him down.
soso.string.299: A new undead den has appeared in the deep south of the town. Well-equipped, ceaseless undead threaten the town. Go to the new den, the “Tree-Eroded Ancient City,” and defeat ten Evilsteel Rot-Zombies to prove Sno’s self-defense capability to the relief forces from Seimen.
soso.string.300: In battle you used the Green-Soul Sword to break Shunchang’s ultra-fast regeneration, but the sword shattered as a result. Before returning to Sno, use the gap to go to the Eastern Deep Forest and bring back replacement Green-Soul Stones. Explain to the gate guard and ask him to let you through.
soso.string.301: With Yuanchuan’s recommendation, you are qualified to commission the legion’s best smith—Taixin. With his skill, craft the Green-Soul Curse Bead.
soso.string.302: To craft the Green-Soul Curse Bead, Taixin needs raw Green-Soul ore. Help him collect “Green-Soul Ore ×4、Death-Domain Keen Honey ×16.”
soso.string.303: The guard captain’s enlistment test is to defeat 10 “Mine-Pit Grudge Corpses” in the “Rooted Deep-Cavern.” Take them down swiftly to prove your ability!
soso.string.304: Due to the demonkin’s movements, the Eastern Deep Forest is currently closed. In the city of Seimen, find someone who knows a way to slip outside the walls.
soso.string.305: It seems there is a secret passage under the well for the Silver Wolf bandits’ dealings with demonkin. Use it to bypass the gate’s watch and enter the Eastern Deep Forest. Set out when ready!
soso.string.306: While gathering intel, you ran into a suspicious man—Wange—who fled in an instant. He seems to have escaped the Silver Wolf bandits’ extermination. Since the bandits and demonkin are in contact, he may know a way to the Eastern Deep Forest. Find him and get the method.
soso.string.307: You brought back the ritual sword forged from Yuanchuan’s blade, establishing the core preparation for the rite. Hurry back to Seimen and exchange intel with Wange.
soso.string.308: To obtain a Green-Soul weapon, you made a deal with Zhonghua: give him 10 Illicit Gold Coins and Mithril Ingots and he will hand over the weapon. To gather these materials, head into the wilds.
soso.string.309: Exiting the cave, you arrive at the Sixth Demon Army’s invasion camp—Banena. Speak with Yuanchuan in the largest main tent.
soso.string.310: The subjugation operation is over; Biaosu was felled in battle, but there is something to be said about the dragon he summoned. Speak with Yanchi in the meeting room...
soso.string.311: Yanchi lost in his duel with Biaosu. Catch up to the already-departed Yanchi and learn the method from him.
soso.string.312: Obtain the Green-Soul Curse Bead—the curse’s core—from Taixin.
soso.string.313: You learned startling news about the demonkin from Cardon and decide to relay it to Captain Reig exactly as heard.
soso.string.314: Leaving the depths of the Holy Capital—Woden—and returning to the surface, you choose to head to where Yanchi is and confirm the condition of the one who left ahead.
soso.string.315: Following the waymarks, the falling snow thins along the road and vast mountains stretch ahead. You reach the Mengteng Mountain Range; from here you will head to Seimen.
soso.string.316: The curse has altered... Having slipped from the caster’s control, it is running wild, and the only way to stop it—the Green-Soul Rite—is incomplete and ineffective against overly powerful beings. Head to the Sacred Tree’s crown and slay the dragon still eroding it; then the rite will sweep away all gloom.
soso.string.317: The emergence of the Great Cathedral proves the “Tree-Eroded Ancient City” is indeed the ancient Holy Capital—Woden. Bring your findings to Yanchi and discuss countermeasures.
soso.string.318: To explore the camp’s depths, you must obtain clothes similar to the garrison’s—either ambush a legionary or purchase a uniform—then check with Yanchi whether the disguise suits.
soso.string.319: Though you cannot go by the secret route, thanks to Wange’s help you can depart via the checkpoint to the Eastern Deep Forest... Meet Yuanchuan at the center of the fighting.
soso.string.320: Keep following the guidance and speak with Yanchi deep in the Lost Forest.
soso.string.321: Prepare the bare minimum of supplies... and set out again through the Eastern Deep Forest to Banena.
soso.string.322: The subjugation army is en route to Sno. However anxious you are, all you can do is wait...
soso.string.323: Just as you are about to be surrounded by the garrison, Reig’s voice rings out from afar. Head there without hesitation—under Reig’s lead, you escape! Speak with Reig who led you out!
soso.string.324: The hard-delivered letter was well received, but the garrison needs time to prepare. Use the chance to ask around for the Green-Soul weapon Yanchi wants.
soso.string.325: By a narrow escape... in Seimen’s sewers you stumbled upon exchanges between the Silver Wolf group and the demonkin; if left unchecked, the city will soon become a battlefield. Just as you are about to leave the sewers, Wange appears before you.
soso.string.326: At Sno’s guard guild, speak with Reig and confirm the town’s situation since you left.
soso.string.327: You will be away from the village for a while. Before departing to the lord’s city, Seimen, say a word to Yanchi, then set out.
soso.string.333: Find an anvil, rename it, then place in main hand and press Q to drop.
soso.string.334: Allows renaming of elite monsters heavily strengthened with points
soso.string.336: Floating Island Guardian; respawn time is 1 minute.
soso.string.337: Can be placed anywhere on the field.
soso.string.338: The guardian can forcibly cancel core-breaking nearby.
soso.string.344: Fire at the nearest enemy within range 14,
soso.string.345: dealing damage [scales with Magic Attack] with a magic annihilation shot.

soso.string.1954: For a weapon pursuing the ultimate, imbuement is indispensable alongside enchantments. Imbuement forces magic from high‑purity mana crystals into the weapon, overloading it to expand its mana capacity limit.
soso.string.1955: An imbued weapon resonates with the wielder’s mana for greater power—keener cuts, deeper arrows, stronger spells... everything can be raised without end.
soso.string.1956: The imbuement recipe is simple: your class weapon plus mana‑bearing crystals.
soso.string.1957: Place the weapon in the center, surround it with 1–8 mana‑bearing crystals.
soso.string.1960: Though simple, compressing high‑purity mana may fail; extraction and compression are difficult even for master smiths. The more mana invested, the higher the success chance.
soso.string.1961: If imbuement fails, it not only fails to raise capacity, the mana backlash damages existing capacity. To prevent this, include special crystals from high‑tier monsters in the recipe.
soso.string.1962: Such high‑grade crystals are hard to obtain, but for top‑tier imbued weapons you must invest many crystals—protection is essential.
soso.string.1963: Difficult—but the path to the ultimate weapon lies in imbuement. If you seek the strongest, you must challenge it; you won’t want to miss it.

soso.string.2008: Secret arts are different: using sealing materials to accumulate field mana and release arts written within.
soso.string.2009: There are constraints, but great effects can be achieved with little mana.
soso.string.2010: Limits: time is needed to gather field mana; moving areas resets it. Using one art tome releases mana from others as well.
soso.string.2011: Thus powerful arts require long gathering; to solve this you must pay a price to trigger arts without mana.

soso.string.2343: Within all things resides 「Principle」, for example, from the material 【Iron Ingot】 one can derive concepts such as 《Iron-Made》, 《Sturdy》, 《Metal》....
soso.string.2344: Breaking a material into its underlying 「Principle」 and attaching it to a weapon is what constitutes enchantment enhancement.
soso.string.2345: The method for extracting a material’s 「Principle」 is simple, place the material in the center, and encircle it with a ring of extraction materials.
soso.string.2346: A single material is composed of three primary 「Principles」, and each extraction yields only one of them.
soso.string.2348: The scrolls of extracted 「Principle」 fall into two major categories, 《Prefix》 and 《Suffix》, and can be attached separately to weapons.
soso.string.2349: However, scrolls for the same slot conflict; applying the same-slot enchantment to a weapon will overwrite the old enchantment effect.
soso.string.2351: If there are unwanted enchantments, you can also put the enchantment scroll into the forge to recover five extraction materials
soso.string.2352: Using a material’s Principle to enhance a weapon is a simple yet powerful method, but to extract enchantments that strengthen a specific aspect requires trying many different materials.
soso.string.2353: Although only two enchantments can be attached to a weapon, the impact is significant; to clear stronger stages, choosing the right enchantments is essential.

soso.string.3319: Magic attack power is not affected..

soso.string.3324: and you must keep attacking until all final challenges are completed..

soso.string.3547: After seeing your fight with the Silver Bear, I knew..
soso.string.3549: As expected, someone like me could never bring you down..
soso.string.3550: Suffered such heavy wounds—ah, ah, this is going out of control..
soso.string.3551: Sorry, it seems—the loser should bow out gracefully, but I just can’t die..
soso.string.3552: You can handle it, right? Stay alive, then go to the Eastern Deep Forest..
soso.string.3555: The injuries you inflicted are regenerating at a speed visible to the naked eye..
soso.string.3556: Can sustained output take him down？？
soso.string.3557: No—the recovery is far too fast..
soso.string.3559: Oh, right—the Green-Soul Sword... a sword that absorbs life force..
soso.string.3560: §7A sword made from Green-Soul Stone, already ancient..
soso.string.3563: The sword broke in a single strike... but it worked—it left a wound..
soso.string.3564: I can feel his regenerative power weakening!!
soso.string.3568: Thus, the bloodthirsty ritual triggered by the Green-Soul Jewel has begun..
soso.string.3569: The curse targets the Sacred Tree... and all its kin..
soso.string.3570: Undead who use the Sacred Tree’s mana will be erased by the curse......
soso.string.3572: The gem’s life-curse is drawing in... the undead’s life force......
soso.string.3573: Soon the tainted lives will be wiped out at once, unable to infect the surroundings again......
soso.string.3574: Everything has come to its conclusion......
soso.string.3577: You... you... what are you thinking!!
soso.string.3579: Just removing those who get in our way... why make a fuss？？
soso.string.3580: Or did you think that once inside the sanctum, no one could stop you？？
soso.string.3581: Surprised？ I was summoned in through your ritual......
soso.string.3582: Using the life-flow produced by the curse... you locked onto the phase of the Holy-Spirit Tree Altar!？？
soso.string.3583: I told Biao Su long ago—we had to be careful of you......
soso.string.3585: ,just one final step and you could have crushed our plan..
soso.string.3586: For better or worse, you’ve sped up the plan a great deal......
soso.string.3587: Silver Wolf, Silver Bear, Holy Capital, Demon King... you meddled in so many things... ruined many of my plans......
soso.string.3588: But in the end, you fell to me... I stopped the lifeline ritual!!
soso.string.3589: You... just what are you thinking!？ You’re no longer even human......
soso.string.3590: Even corrupted by mana to this extent—what is it you still want to accomplish？？
soso.string.3591: ...I just wanted to end the war... that’s all......
soso.string.3592: War...？ The Human–Demon War ended seventy years ago......
soso.string.3595: The vile demons still live in this world!!
soso.string.3596: They bare their fangs, preparing to strike us!!
soso.string.3597: You’re mad... blood-for-blood vengeance never ends......
soso.string.3599: Because right now, you will meet your end here!!
soso.string.3604: You can definitely stop their plan!!
soso.string.3605: May my blessing go with you!!
soso.string.3610: Keep up! I called you this time to let you witness the gap in strength..
soso.string.3611: So？ How far have you pushed this undead nest？？
soso.string.3612: No, this nest was only discovered recently, we......
soso.string.3613: Hmph, looks like it’s just in the shallow layer..
soso.string.3615: Watch! Today we’ll wipe out this nest in one go..
soso.string.3616: An undead that summons the undead？？
soso.string.3619: But don’t you think it’s a bit excessive？ ...In that case, the garrison’s funds......
soso.string.3620: Not at all! Who decided it’s excessive？？
soso.string.3621: Do you want our members to fight in dangerous conditions？？
soso.string.3622: I’m not asking you to bear any costs!!
soso.string.3623: Just trade with the mithril you can’t currently mine!!
soso.string.3625: Not satisfied？ Then we’ll withdraw our troops right now!!
soso.string.3627: Then shut up and accept our terms!!
soso.string.3628: All along the way... this nest really looks like some kind of ruin......
soso.string.3629: Holy Capital ─ Woden, the stronghold of the Holy-Tree Church..
soso.string.3630: I thought if we just held Sno, we’d find it one day; didn’t expect it to be this soon..
soso.string.3632: As expected... Soldiers! Go in... search!!
soso.string.3635: That’s right... this is the Woden Grand Cathedral; you... know quite a bit..
soso.string.3636: What are you here searching for......
soso.string.3637: That’s not something you need to know..
soso.string.3639: Report to the captain: it’s a map of the Forest of Lost Paths......
soso.string.3640: Well done, you’ll be rewarded later. Search! Keep searching!!
soso.string.3641: Oh, and a zombie so lavishly equipped!!
soso.string.3642: Must have been someone important in life! But in the end it will still be buried under my axe..
soso.string.3643: Hmph, so that’s all for the deepest part of the nest!!
soso.string.3644: But with your ability you couldn’t have pushed this far..
soso.string.3645: You’d better reconsider stationing troops... without us, what would your end be..
soso.string.3649: My legion fights on the foremost eastern front.
soso.string.3650: Unlike the weak western army that defected, however many come... I kill that many!
soso.string.3651: You asked a very tactless question of the commander.
soso.string.3652: Harm cannot be undone; hatred only keeps piling up.
soso.string.3654: The harm still remains, and the pain keeps on.
soso.string.3655: There seem to be quite a lot of the bandit gang’s remnants!
soso.string.3656: But up ahead seems to be their final fighting force.
soso.string.3658: Everyone... this is the final battle inheriting the captain’s will..
soso.string.3660: Small fry, stand down! I, Biao Su, will take you on!!
soso.string.3661: Without Shunchang, the Silver Wolf Bandits are just this much..
soso.string.3662: Let’s go—pass down the orders! Muster the troops!!
soso.string.3663: March to the place of the Sacred Tree ─ Sno!!
soso.string.3665: Oh ho, quite the big shot..
soso.string.3666: Isn’t this the hero who single‑handedly charged into the undead host and even slew a demon？？
soso.string.3667: Coming alone to deliver a letter in this desolate wild—aren’t you afraid？？
soso.string.3668: This is a dangerous mountain region full of bandits and beasts..
soso.string.3670: I am the leader of the bandit gang of the Mengteng Mountain Range ─ Shunchang!!
soso.string.3671: Leader of the Silver Wolf Bandits ─ Shunchang
soso.string.3672: Honored hero, I have a small proposal......
soso.string.3673: Hand over the letter in your hand to us—this is the best proposal for both you and me!!
soso.string.3675: No helping it; I really didn’t want to, but this is your choice......
soso.string.3677: A member of the Security Corps？ Yes, I am Lag, the priest of Hafos Village..
soso.string.3678: Thank you for arranging space to house us. Thanks to your help, the villagers did not suffer in the cold wind..
soso.string.3679: You want to ask what happened in the village？ Ah... that day, nothing was unusual..
soso.string.3680: By day I presided over morning service, heard confessions of the faithful, and inspected the village’s warding barrier..
soso.string.3681: After nightfall, the night watch rang the alarm bell..
soso.string.3682: People gathered in the square and heard... zombies were surging out of the graveyard..
soso.string.3683: The Security Corps, those able to fight, and I immediately assembled to subjugate them..
soso.string.3684: But strangely... no matter how we purified them, it had no effect..
soso.string.3685: We fought and grappled to the death; the number of undead only grew and grew..
soso.string.3686: At last we all fell back to the square to hold out until dawn, until.........
soso.string.3688: A hole was smashed through the defensive line..
soso.string.3689: The undead broke through the breach and invaded..
soso.string.3690: We were forced to decide to abandon the village and retreat..
soso.string.3691: Listen... this wasn’t some natural occurrence!!
soso.string.3692: A few guards and I stayed as rear guard to let the villagers escape..
soso.string.3693: At the very end, we saw it... a 「demon」..
soso.string.3694: Those demons imprisoned at the end of the continent—they’ve returned!!
soso.string.3695: No joke! Our forced exile is the best proof..
soso.string.3696: Those undead were many and tenacious, and protected by the demons’ spells, they couldn’t be purified..
soso.string.3697: Please help us drive back the undead wandering in the village... we beg you..
soso.string.3698: What happened!？ After the ritual began, a huge noise came..
soso.string.3699: ...The ritual failed—broke the seals of the Forest of Lost Paths and the gate......
soso.string.3700: And just barged straight in... doesn’t this mean... no matter when or where we hold the ritual, it will be obstructed!!
soso.string.3701: And... the critical Holy-Spirit Tree Altar has been occupied like this......
soso.string.3702: What are you going to do next.........
soso.string.3703: Head again to the demons’ camp to craft a new core......
soso.string.3704: But... won’t it be stopped this time too......
soso.string.3705: Right... all we can do is try again......
soso.string.3706: Then... first head to Seimen... let’s go......
soso.string.3709: Looks like I can really avoid notice.
soso.string.3712: A sacrificial ritual that looks ominous.
soso.string.3713: The tent next to it seems different from the others; maybe we can figure out the situation.
soso.string.3717: I can’t wait to see the demons’ pained expressions!!
soso.string.3718: Failed to find ‘him’ in the depths of the Holy Capital and was upset for a while!!
soso.string.3719: Never thought we’d discover ‘him’ while retaking Hafos Village!!
soso.string.3720: This is the best revenge on the demons—drop the undead that the ‘Demon King’ incarnated as seventy years ago right in the center of the demons’ camp!!
soso.string.3722: It’s sure to cause plenty of casualties! Just like what they once did to us!!
soso.string.3723: Hah, don’t stop here—we won’t just pay them back; we’ll repay double!!
soso.string.3724: How’s the map of the Forest of Lost Paths coming along？？
soso.string.3725: There are some ciphers, but for a high cleric of the Holy-Tree Church like me that’s nothing!!
soso.string.3728: Hey! Who are you—no entry here!!
soso.string.3729: Something’s wrong! Protect the map, now!!
soso.string.3731: They’ve got the map—take them down and seize it!!
soso.string.3732: So the map is in hand......
soso.string.3733: But how should we handle this？？
soso.string.3736: Night Watch, to positions! Grab them
soso.string.3737: So we have to pull back for now......
soso.string.3738: Only after entering inside do I feel it... such a strong miasma.
soso.string.3739: Filth has already spread into the sanctum; no wonder the Holy-Spirits do not welcome us.
soso.string.3742: The Holy-Spirit Tree Altar’s control apparatus is probably running amok.
soso.string.3746: Rampaging guardian statues, wrathful Holy‑Spirits, drifters of time and space, feral sacrificial beasts—each far exceeds my limit...
soso.string.3747: If I keep going I’ll only drag you down... you’re truly too strong!!
soso.string.3748: No... sorry, it’s not that I fear you...
soso.string.3750: Next we head for the topmost level.
soso.string.3751: Lanwang is likely at the top as well... for the curse to worsen so much... that must be it.
soso.string.3752: Which means... a head‑on clash really is unavoidable, huh.
soso.string.3754: Though I know there isn’t much time we can buy...
soso.string.3755: Seize the time... once the ritual ends, victory is ours.
soso.string.3756: Once again... it’s before me again.
soso.string.3757: Biao Su failed again... a subordinate worthy of trust, and further strengthened by the curse.
soso.string.3758: He even brought the Erosion-Dragon... and still it ends like this？？
soso.string.3759: No intention of calling it off？？
soso.string.3760: I won’t stop... rather, you lot—how far will you go to hinder me before you’re satisfied？？
soso.string.3761: By using this forbidden curse and the inexhaustible power gained from the Sacred Tree, the demons can be exterminated very soon.
soso.string.3762: ...We’ve no intention of letting you succeed.
soso.string.3763: You snot‑nosed lads... even if you never saw the Great War, you’ve heard how terrifying the demons are.
soso.string.3764: In actually dealing with them... perhaps they are a bit coarse.
soso.string.3765: But they are people who can talk and laugh; among them are those who wish to avoid war.
soso.string.3766: Shut up! Those beasts are a living calamity—left alone, one day they will endanger humankind.
soso.string.3767: Me... I’ve never seen a demon in my life, but to me you’re scarier than any demon......
soso.string.3769: ...As I thought, it’s pointless to discuss demons with those who never experienced the Great War.
soso.string.3771: ...In the end, it still comes down to power？？
soso.string.3772: Even if I lose here now... it doesn’t matter......
soso.string.3773: To the human warriors I offer my highest respect......
soso.string.3774: Though you’ve hindered me many times, your strength is undoubtedly at the level of heroes of the Great War......
soso.string.3776: Your skill far surpasses these two by several lengths... I hear you’ve fought on the western frontier for over twenty years.
soso.string.3777: But it’s useless—no matter how much output you pour out, as long as we’re within the Sanctuary... all wounds will heal.
soso.string.3778: You cannot bring me to ruin!!
soso.string.3780: I’m searching... whether there’s a way, like with Biao Su then, to isolate the curse.
soso.string.3781: But the curse is tightly meshed with this man—there’s no way to sever it.
soso.string.3782: This curse is tightly bound to my hatred!!
soso.string.3783: My homeland was destroyed in the Human–Demon War!!
soso.string.3784: Thrown onto the battlefield from childhood, I fought for years!!
soso.string.3785: I cut down countless demons, and even so it wasn’t enough!!
soso.string.3786: It all ended absurdly, in that battle in the Holy Capital Woden......
soso.string.3787: Wouldn’t it be fine to put a rest there, in that battle？？
soso.string.3788: The Demon King was struck down by the hero; the eight Demon Generals retreated with their remaining forces.
soso.string.3790: The blood the demons paid for the war isn’t enough...!!
soso.string.3791: Clearly what comes next is when the demons pay the price......
soso.string.3792: No... even if the Demon King is slain, the Demon Generals who are the eight clans’ chiefs wield power no less than the Demon King.
soso.string.3793: In the end, whoever stands amid the ruins isn’t settled......
soso.string.3794: Hah？ Are you saying the ones spared were us humans？？
soso.string.3795: That’s wrong... if we kept fighting, the victors would be... us!!
soso.string.3800: See, your estimate was wildly off!!
soso.string.3801: You can’t even tell the overwhelming gap in strength before your eyes!!
soso.string.3805: ...Run all you like, you cannot stop me!!
soso.string.3806: No—we can’t retreat; if we do, who will stop him.........
soso.string.3811: Let’s go; the subjugation operation has already begun.
soso.string.3813: How long has it been since the three of us fought together like this......
soso.string.3815: Sorry, Rock‑Gallop... I’ve held it against you ever since that operation failed.
soso.string.3816: No... it’s me... I failed to notice the Sacred Tree’s anomaly sooner.
soso.string.3817: But I didn’t expect... the consequences would actually be this serious......
soso.string.3818: Who would have thought... your choice back then would be right...
soso.string.3819: So it was that day... that life extinguished, and the curse began to spread outward....
soso.string.3820: Went deeper and deeper... gradually eroding both the demons and the undead....
soso.string.3822: Even included the Sky‑Gazing Spire built by the human kingdom......
soso.string.3823: Perhaps that day... there was already no way to change anything....
soso.string.3826: I know: from the very beginning I knew!
soso.string.3827: He is a hero of the Great War who fought for years on the western frontier.
soso.string.3828: Even after the war ended he still... continued to hunt the demons!
soso.string.3829: There are many like him among humankind....
soso.string.3830: Harboring hatred toward demons... and trying to annihilate them...
soso.string.3831: If only... if only I hadn’t met them...!
soso.string.3832: I wouldn’t have had such a beautiful dream... a far‑off dream of peace!
soso.string.3834: Are you worried that the demons will descend on this place？!
soso.string.3835: I don’t know... I can’t foresee the future!
soso.string.3836: But... the current upheaval at the Holy‑Spirit Tree Altar probably isn’t over.
soso.string.3837: Although the Demon King has not revived, the demons have begun to stir—!
soso.string.3838: they are no longer the demons of seventy years ago!
soso.string.3839: Ah—if only at that time we had protected Sno...!
soso.string.3840: At the least... we could have avoided the current outcome...!
soso.string.3841: And had he possessed just a little less power... perhaps the war wouldn’t have spread so quickly...!
soso.string.3842: We would have been able to prepare in time...!
soso.string.3843: No... now’s not the time to think about that...!
soso.string.3844: Now we have to do what we can right now...!
soso.string.3845: We must first deal with our looming enemies!
soso.string.3846: Only then is there hope of victory!
soso.string.3847: Go report to the Security Corps; ask them to increase the personnel stationed at the outpost—!
soso.string.3848: the warehouse stores must maintain a higher reserve than usual!
soso.string.3850: I have accepted God’s instruction and returned to the job I should be doing!
soso.string.3851: The entire village was transferred to the Town Under the Tree...
soso.string.3852: We seized the time to get repairs, and by the way reinforced the Chapel of the Sea Breeze...
soso.string.3853: Part of the Refuge of Light has also entered operation...
soso.string.3854: The search for the Silver Wolf Bandits... has priority as well.
soso.string.3855: However... despite that... I still don’t feel at ease.
soso.string.3856: I rushed back to the village with the faithful!
soso.string.3857: I’m sorry... the Holy‑Tree Church’s doctrine is very strict!
soso.string.3858: By following the faith, I hope to be forgiven by God...!
soso.string.3859: I also believe... everyone in the village will be saved by God...!
soso.string.3860: Right now... the Holy‑Spirit Tree Altar is still in danger!
soso.string.3861: And the Silver Wolf Bandits will probably continue hunting the villagers...!
soso.string.3862: Please continue to protect the villagers—!
soso.string.3863: when I finish off the undead squatting in the village, I will come to assist everyone!
soso.string.3864: ...I will always be grateful for what you’ve done...
soso.string.3867: Report: suspected location of the Silver Wolf Bandits’ leader confirmed.
soso.string.3868: Currently it seems he’s making camp in a cave deep inside the Mengteng Mountain Range.
soso.string.3871: Gather the regiment; commence armed investigation.
soso.string.3873: So you found the Silver Wolf Bandits’ leader’s nest？？
soso.string.3874: I know—this order has been issued: defeat the bandit leader.
soso.string.3875: In addition, all members of the bandit group are to be eliminated.
soso.string.3876: We must bring them down here, for the sake of the human road and morality.
soso.string.3877: This order requires action from us and from the stationed forces in Seimen.
soso.string.3878: Kill the bandit leader—as well as the leader of the bandit group.
soso.string.3880: So this is the base camp, humph....
soso.string.3881: However, as long as they’re just bandits, it’s nothing to be afraid of.
soso.string.3882: Let the stationed forces assist our operation.
soso.string.3884: Excuse me, could the Silver Wolf Bandits possibly be involved in this attack？.
soso.string.3885: I don’t know—could be a coincidence.
soso.string.3886: But the oppression felt from afar is definitely no illusion.
soso.string.3887: I must continue to monitor the demons’ movements; you go back and report.
soso.string.3888: I hope everything won’t be too late.
soso.string.3889: 【Click “Book of Adventure” and select “Return to Instance Entrance” to leave quickly】
soso.string.3891: We’ve finally reached the deepest part of the cave.
soso.string.3892: Split the troops and stand guard all around! I will awaken the power of the Sacred Tree to cleanse this place.
soso.string.3899: The monsters around us are getting more and more numerous.
soso.string.3903: If you insist on that... then don’t blame me for using force!!
soso.string.3904: I believe the hero can tough it out, right!!
soso.string.3906: It won’t be too painful; just hand over the letter and it will all be over!!
soso.string.3907: Oh, you can still hold on!!
soso.string.3908: I admit I underestimated you! Looks like I have to take the field myself!!
soso.string.3909: Hmph, you’re a tough one—looks like the title “hero” isn’t just for show..
soso.string.3910: I thought snatching it would be quicker, but it seems talking with you is better..
soso.string.3911: Nothing good will happen if you deliver that letter to the lord..
soso.string.3913: Spend enough time with him and you’ll understand..
soso.string.3914: Right now, Sno with its mithril mine isn’t controlled by the lord, but is under direct national administration..
soso.string.3915: The letter in your hand will break that balance..
soso.string.3916: It will make the lord’s interference in Sno seem justified..
soso.string.3917: ...Necessary in order to fight the undead？？
soso.string.3919: The one who profits from turning Sno into a hell overrun by the undead..
soso.string.3920: It’s the lord; he will take over the entire mine..
soso.string.3921: ...So you still won’t hand over the letter？ Then I’ll just take it by force!!
soso.string.3925: Looks like it’s not the time to keep fighting—retreat!!
soso.string.3926: Hero! If you’re still alive, remember to consider what I said..
soso.string.3928: Shake off the Silver Bear’s pursuit and head for the Fortress City ─ Seimen!!
soso.string.3929: 《The direction to Fortress City Seimen is not here.》》
soso.string.3931: Human! If you want to stop me, then prove your strength!!
soso.string.3932: Defeat me to prove you can do better than I!!
soso.string.3934: Oh oh! Here they are... this is the one I mentioned before
soso.string.3935: He is the new leader who replaced Captain Shunchang; he will lead us to continue the plan..
soso.string.3936: ...Don’t worry! His power is the real deal..
soso.string.3937: Look at his solid stride... and overflowing mana.....
soso.string.3938: With him here, the plan will surely......
soso.string.3941: This is the dog sent by Lanwang, the one who dealt with your captain, right!!
soso.string.3942: Hah, what are you bringing this guy to see me for？？
soso.string.3943: Have him take me down？ What can a human do to me？？
soso.string.3945: Even a human “hero” is nothing but small fry to me!!
soso.string.3946: I am the pinnacle of the demonfolk—a Demon General! Above me there is only the Demon King!!
soso.string.3947: You humans seem to have some mistaken notions about the Great War seventy years ago!!
soso.string.3948: The so‑called hero who felled our Demon King back then was a demon!!
soso.string.3949: You survived only thanks to infighting among demons!!
soso.string.3950: The current Demon King—that “hero” is merciful toward you monkeys..
soso.string.3951: He doesn’t look to solve everything with power, so regarding the Sacred Tree’s mutation......
soso.string.3952: I decided to let you humans resolve your internal problem yourselves!!
soso.string.3953: So your answer is that you want to play at being “heroes”？？
soso.string.3954: What is it, human？ Do you have something to say？？
soso.string.3955: Are you also someone who wants to resolve the Sacred Tree’s aberration？？
soso.string.3956: Anyone can talk big; humans caused the aberration, then claimed you’d fix it, yet dragged it out so long!!
soso.string.3957: I’ve decided—I will mobilize the demons’ army, break this Fortress City, and then burn your Sacred Tree!!
soso.string.3958: Impossible! Mere humans actually managed to defeat me!!
soso.string.3959: Aaagh! Since you’ve shown your power and struck me down....
soso.string.3960: I’ll yield to you; come out from the cave..
soso.string.3961: We will welcome you to our camp ─ Banena..
soso.string.3964: A youth comes from a far‑off battlefield......
soso.string.3965: He goes to that land of giant trees far from the din of war
soso.string.3967: But the Sacred Tree’s blessing is with him......
soso.string.3970: Let me think... the prologue of this adventure began in the Town Under the Tree, Sno......
soso.string.3972: ,seems to have run into some obstacles!!
soso.string.3973: It was an undead wandering in the Sacred‑Tree Forest......
soso.string.3974: Although you could slowly use the sword—cutting it down stroke by stroke......
soso.string.3975: Hold the Dustwind Sword and press F; when enough charge builds, press F again to use Impact Slash and fell the undead!!
soso.string.3977: Press F to start charging the battle skill!!
soso.string.3978: Wait for the battle skill to charge!!
soso.string.3979: Press F to use the battle skill!!
soso.string.3980: Mana has exceeded what Impact Slash requires; press F again!!
soso.string.3981: But the youth neatly shattered the undead with a single Impact Slash......
soso.string.3982: Up ahead... another group of undead appeared..
soso.string.3983: Using the sword to fell all of them at once may be difficult..
soso.string.3984: Hold the Dustwind Staff and keep holding right‑click; when mana is sufficient, release to use Fireball and burn the dead!!
soso.string.3987: Release right‑click to cast the spell!!
soso.string.3988: Under the Sacred Tree’s protection, undead rarely appear in this forest..
soso.string.3989: But the youth’s luck is bad; a terrifying group of undead appeared up ahead again..
soso.string.3990: You’ll need powerful magic to burn this group of undead to ash..
soso.string.3991: Hold the Dustwind Staff and keep holding right‑click; when monsters approach, switch to an empty hotbar slot or Q the staff to pause charging mana, then use Tier‑2 magic 《Burning Earth》 to burn the undead!!
soso.string.3992: Switch to an empty slot or throw the staff to preserve the charge!!
soso.string.3993: Preserve the charge to cast higher‑tier magic!!
soso.string.3994: Release right‑click to cast Burning Earth!!
soso.string.3995: Amid the blazing flames, one undead survived..
soso.string.3996: Clad in jet‑black mage‑armor and grasping a jet‑black battle‑axe, it radiates an ominous aura......
soso.string.3997: It’s no surprise it can also withstand magic designed for area annihilation......
soso.string.3999: With the Dustwind Sword in hand, press F; when enough charge builds, press F again to use Crescent Flash and fell the undead!!
soso.string.4000: After charging Crescent Flash, press F then left‑click the target to cast!!
soso.string.4001: With Crescent Flash... cut it down.
soso.string.4002: This was an interlude before the character reached the stage of the story.
soso.string.4003: The youth will head for the Town Under the Tree ─ Sno.
soso.string.4004: The prologue of the adventure is about to begin......
soso.string.4006: I think this bulletin board still has some information worth checking
soso.string.4007: Open the Book of Adventure and click 《Main Story Guidance》 to find the road to Sno.
soso.string.4008: Such overwhelming power—without See-Through, you can still feel mana gathering on him!!
soso.string.4009: As expected! This is the protective effect of the Blessing Sigil.
soso.string.4010: Next I’ll use See-Through Magic; hold on a bit—this will be over soon.
soso.string.4011: What! How is this vast Sacred Tree mana crammed into his body... even the undead nearby are overflowing with Sacred Tree mana......
soso.string.4014: Sorry, I spaced out; I’ve identified the location of his Blessing Sigil.
soso.string.4018: I’ve already destroyed the blessing gear on him!!
soso.string.4019: Keep fighting! Now there should be a way to damage him!!
soso.string.4022: Pour holy life into the earth!!
soso.string.4025: The Sacred Tree’s life force is declining!!
soso.string.4026: As if something is absorbing it...!!
soso.string.4029: The numbers are starting to increase more and more!!
soso.string.4030: What in the world is going on!!
soso.string.4031: It’s no good... operation failed, retreat!!
soso.string.4032: Retreat routes are packed with monsters; we can’t escape!!
soso.string.4033: Don’t be afraid! I grant you the Sacred Tree’s blessing.
soso.string.4034: Use the blessing’s power to fell the monsters and escape alive!!

soso.string.4068: Tsk... you really do pop up everywhere.
soso.string.4069: It wasn’t aimed at you... but since you showed up......
soso.string.4070: let me have a little fun with you!!
soso.string.4071: Well？ Wasn’t the gift we gave them in the demon camp earlier spectacular enough？？
soso.string.4072: Turned that barbarian chieftain into an undead and made them slaughter each other.
soso.string.4074: Hmph—serves you right for dealing with demons.
soso.string.4075: For such betrayal of humankind, getting killed is only fitting, isn’t it？？
soso.string.4076: Hm？ Looks like that’s not the reason？？
soso.string.4077: ...Could it be... we really don’t get along......
soso.string.4078: ...Are you angry for the demons who died？ ...Hey now, really？？
soso.string.4079: They were only your trading partners, weren’t they？？
soso.string.4080: Is there any need to take it so seriously？？
soso.string.4081: Your companions don’t think demons are comrades either, do they？？
soso.string.4082: Heh—touched a sore spot, did I!!
soso.string.4086: At your wit’s end, aren’t you!!
soso.string.4087: One last question, just in case......
soso.string.4088: Would you be willing to give up the struggle？？
soso.string.4089: We call ourselves the guardians of humankind.
soso.string.4090: We obtained this power to slay demons.
soso.string.4091: Not to use it for infighting among humans.
soso.string.4092: I can spare you—if you promise not to obstruct us again.
soso.string.4097: Looks like you were in a tough fight; you won’t mind if we lend a hand, right？？
soso.string.4099: You dead monster! Could you not lay a hand on my friend？？
soso.string.4100: You brat! Do you know what you’re doing？？
soso.string.4102: ,Even so, I don’t know how long we can hold!!
soso.string.4103: Quickly regroup for battle, then seize the right moment to retreat!!
soso.string.4107: Damn, they’ve slipped among the soldiers—search! Watch for suspicious people around you; we must catch him this time..
soso.string.4110: Only 20%？ That’s nowhere near enough to deal with you......
soso.string.4112: Merely the result of tweaking you humans’ crude spellcraft..
soso.string.4113: To try to use me with such a spell—humans truly are an amusing race, don’t you think？？
soso.string.4114: Anyway... fulfill your duty; bring me one last joyful slaughter!!
soso.string.4115: Thanks for the trouble, bringing a letter all the way to me..
soso.string.4117: Mm, let me make it clear first. Though there truly is some conspiracy to it, but....
soso.string.4118: This world cannot be only black and white..
soso.string.4119: Construction never stops, the guard never sleeps...... just patrolling the inner and outer entrances and roads takes several rotating squads..
soso.string.4120: On top of that we must clear sludge from the streets, and restore the ley lines in the wilds ravaged by battles with great monsters.......
soso.string.4121: We also must tidy places of lingering echoes the undead could exploit, meet residents’ daily needs, and suppress demonfolk still eyeing us from the city’s shadows......？
soso.string.4122: Look at yourself—you’re wearing clothing from outside the basin, aren’t you？？
soso.string.4123: You may not know it, but to some extent this is actually an internal issue on our side..
soso.string.4124: Though a few outside forces are tearing down our home as well..
soso.string.4125: And sending you to burn the camp—though justifiable in the name of upholding justice—.
soso.string.4126: don’t forget, when you’re blood‑soaked, 〈for what〉 and 〈for whom〉 you fight..
soso.string.4127: I dislike how this city, dragged into war, has its very vitality drained..
soso.string.4128: So you must know which choice is the best to make..
soso.string.4129: Protecting him is important to an individual—and perhaps to the city as well..
soso.string.4130: Everyone is a resident of their city..
soso.string.4134: And what you need to do now is rest..
soso.string.4135: Come find me after you rest. You’ll grasp the details faster once your fatigue recedes..
soso.string.4136: If you’re tired, I believe even a goal aimed at the darkness will grow unclear..
soso.string.4137: I know you possess more life‑force than we do..
soso.string.4139: We will handle the city’s emotional unrest that would have arisen had you not intervened..
soso.string.4140: And we’ll first address the daily needs neglected by military operations..
soso.string.4141: We will first temporarily stabilize the city’s residents..
soso.string.4143: Force this Demon King back underground once more..
soso.string.4144: Those who have fallen into the depths are merely waiting for dawn..
soso.string.4145: Believe that they have the same heart as you..
soso.string.4146: 〈Then we’ll leave it at that for now〉.
soso.string.4149: Now I will deliver an order..
soso.string.4150: By virtue of your past achievement in stopping the Erosion Cross Church from handing the city’s people over to religion.
soso.string.4151: and your merit in establishing good relations with Antibu City..
soso.string.4152: you are now officially part of the inner circle..
soso.string.4154: If you can gradually concretize solutions to the problems with the demonfolk and the undead.
soso.string.4155: I will promote you to be my successor as the next acting official..
soso.string.4156: Also strive to study the contents of the divine utterance..
soso.string.4157: And make it so the demons who have poisoned our world and our people will never dare return..
soso.string.4158: You successfully prevented the revival of a Demon King on whom See‑Through was applied.？
soso.string.4159: You now stand on the same footing as them, advancing with justice to the very end..
soso.string.4160: This military order declares: you are now an independent operative with no rank restrictions.？
soso.string.4161: You may freely cooperate with any legion and any group..
soso.string.4162: You have top authority for handling extreme emergencies.
soso.string.4163: You may, without any oversight, carry out any necessary mission....
soso.string.4164: This military order remains valid until your life ends..
soso.string.4168: And you can handle these things..
soso.string.4175: If you cannot stop the demonfolk, then buy time for us to handle it..
soso.string.4176: Please continue working together with us..
soso.string.4177: Next time it will be our turn to help you..
soso.string.4178: By then our city will have true unity....
soso.string.4180: You’ve worked hard in this world‑saving operation..
soso.string.4181: If you don’t understand now, I can restate it..
soso.string.4182: You were summoned here because we lack sufficient combat power locally....
soso.string.4183: Recently it has even come to this... if we don’t stop being weak, they will push straight into our lines....
soso.string.4185: This is a world suffused with the Sacred Tree’s mana....
soso.string.4186: The undead are instantly crushed just by touching the Sacred Tree’s radiance..
soso.string.4187: But those undead—rather than being purified, it’s more like... no, it’s nothing.........
soso.string.4188: Right now I’m busy treating members wounded in action..
soso.string.4189: Go confirm the follow‑up plan with your guard captain Reig first..
soso.string.4190: Here again to ask why the purification failed？ I have nothing to say..
soso.string.4191: ...Not that？ The source of the demonfolk’s mysterious power？？
soso.string.4193: You’ve seen mithril gear, right？ Through a special pattern—the Blessing Sigil—it can absorb the Sacred Tree’s mana diffused through this world..
soso.string.4194: And by releasing the absorbed mana, it can offset external attack damage..
soso.string.4195: Normally only humans use this technique..
soso.string.4196: It’s no surprise that very intelligent demonfolk can use it; the Sacred Tree doesn’t reject beings other than the undead..
soso.string.4197: Though... it’s a bit strange. Given a mithril item’s mana‑vessel size, it should only block a single hit..
soso.string.4198: From your description, it wasn’t one or two attacks but dozens of attacks blocked..
soso.string.4199: What kind of vessel could contain enough mana to withstand so many attacks？.
soso.string.4200: I’ll go along on the next subjugation; as long as we use See‑Through to locate and then break the Blessing Sigil, he can be felled..
soso.string.4201: ...What? There won’t be a next subjugation？!
soso.string.4203: I also feel deep sorrow over the death of our Security Corps comrades... he is probably hurting far more than I am.
soso.string.4204: As for why the ritual failed—perhaps I have a lead.
soso.string.4205: It might be... no... that would be too disrespectful... I should speak only after I’m more certain.
soso.string.4206: My love for this town runs as deep as for the Sacred Tree; I will not give up until the very end.
soso.string.4207: Accompany me once more—let’s challenge the demonfolk again.
soso.string.4208: And this time we will bring him down together!
soso.string.4210: Through See‑Through Magic, I saw... the demonfolk’s whole body was filled with the Sacred Tree’s mana.
soso.string.4211: ...No, not only that; even the nearby undead were the same.
soso.string.4212: Before long they will probably awaken once again.
soso.string.4213: Those 「undead」 are not undead in the true sense.
soso.string.4214: They are mindless corpses forcibly restored by the Sacred Tree’s power.
soso.string.4215: That demonfolk is the best proof—foolishly charging straight at humans.
soso.string.4216: It has completely lost both swordsmanship and the intellect to cast magic.
soso.string.4217: Please—I will definitely catch the one who exploits the Sacred Tree’s power.
soso.string.4218: Stand with me at the forefront as heroes who felled the demonfolk.
soso.string.4219: Do not let it become known that our Sacred Tree has been exploited.
soso.string.4220: Are you going to deliver a letter to the eastern Fortress City ─ Seimen？
soso.string.4221: Perhaps... just right. May I ask you to do something at the same time？
soso.string.4222: Regarding those undead... no... corpses, our Holy‑Tree Church has already conducted some research.
soso.string.4223: Even if their bodies are chopped into eight large pieces, they gradually regrow and restore.
soso.string.4224: By the ample Sacred Tree power suffusing this land.
soso.string.4225: Especially when Sacred Tree magic is used to infuse them with life force, they can even instantly repair their bodies and go berserk.
soso.string.4226: They are corpses forcibly pieced together by excessive healing power, driven only by instinct.
soso.string.4227: Therefore, if there is demonic power that suppresses life force, perhaps they can be dealt with.
soso.string.4228: Seventy years ago, after the Demon King—the king of the demonfolk—arose, the Human–Demon War broke out.
soso.string.4229: Its foremost front line was the Fortress City ─ Seimen where the current lord, Lanwang, now sits.
soso.string.4230: There were rumors during the war that the demonfolk used a special weapon.
soso.string.4231: Weapons forged from Green‑Soul Stone, a special ore that can be mined only in demonfolk territory.
soso.string.4232: Tough and sharp... and not only that—they also possessed the power to seize the life of the living.
soso.string.4233: By leveraging the properties of Green‑Soul Stone, we might be able to truly kill those corpses.
soso.string.4234: Seek Green‑Soul Stone in Seimen, whether finished weapons or freshly mined ore.
soso.string.4235: Bring them back; our Church will certainly prepare generous rewards.
soso.string.4236: ...Aside from these, you should know the real reason I called you—how are the preparations？
soso.string.4237: ...Much obliged; you even found a method to deal with the undead.
soso.string.4238: From the present situation it is a method worth trying; can’t you divulge who gave the information...？
soso.string.4239: ...No, I won’t blame you for that; you’ve done very well. Here is the promised reward.
soso.string.4240: Next is the follow‑up portion of the commission...
soso.string.4241: To put it plainly, this curse ritual is a life‑force control ritual.
soso.string.4242: For priests of the Holy‑Tree Church, it isn’t very difficult.
soso.string.4243: The issue is the ritual site—the convergence point of the Sacred Tree’s mana.
soso.string.4244: Without a doubt that points to the Holy‑Spirit Tree Altar at the end of the Forest of Lost Paths...
soso.string.4245: The scar left by the Demon King seventy years ago... is too heavy for humankind.
soso.string.4246: Back then in the Human–Demon War, what most offended the Demon King was the Sacred Tree.
soso.string.4247: Mithril, tree‑arts... all the power by which humans could contend with the demonfolk came from the Sacred Tree.
soso.string.4248: The front kept retreating; human territory was repeatedly plundered by the demonfolk.
soso.string.4249: But being close to the Sacred Tree increased human strength and turned the front into a stalemate.
soso.string.4250: Dissatisfied with this, the Demon King led the eight clans’ chiefs ─ the eight Demon Generals,and forcibly broke through the lines.
soso.string.4251: In the end he was struck down by the hero in the Tree‑Capital ─ Woden,but humankind also lost many things because of it.
soso.string.4252: The hero, the Pope of the Holy‑Tree Church, and the entire Holy Capital were lost,and all the Demon Generals were allowed to escape.
soso.string.4253: The method of passing through the Forest of Lost Paths and the key phrase to open the altar gate also vanished in this war.
soso.string.4254: After hearing your description of the undead nest, I think that must be it.
soso.string.4255: The undead nest is the Holy Capital ─ Woden; all the secrets lie in the city’s depths.
soso.string.4256: I’m asking you to break into the depths to investigate; whether the undead problem can be resolved rests on you.
soso.string.4257: ...Was the map of the Forest of Lost Paths taken away？
soso.string.4258: That isn’t a bad thing; at least it proves it exists. We can ask the stationed army for it later.
soso.string.4259: But why？ Why would the Imperial Army seek a way to the Holy‑Spirit Tree Altar？
soso.string.4261: So the Imperial Army are the enemy, and the demonfolk are already stirring to resolve the aberration？
soso.string.4262: ...Looks like you’re serious... then I hope you can trust me a bit more.
soso.string.4263: Trusting my friends is only natural.
soso.string.4264: So for the map, we’ve now confirmed the Imperial Army holds a copy.
soso.string.4265: What we lack is the gate’s key phrase.
soso.string.4266: You once mentioned... seeing a gorgeously dressed zombie in the depths of the nest.
soso.string.4267: That is likely the undead transformed from the previous Pope; I intend to try to revive him.
soso.string.4268: You still remember the tragedy that happened that day in the Root‑Burrow Deep Pit, right.
soso.string.4269: The Sacred Tree’s mana refined through ritual for purification was instead absorbed by the undead.
soso.string.4270: Not only did it fail to purify them; it instead greatly strengthened the undead.
soso.string.4271: If we pour this immense Sacred Tree mana into the Pope.
soso.string.4272: Maximize restoration of the body; perhaps even the brain can be repaired along with it.
soso.string.4273: Restore his reason; then we can learn the opening key phrase of the altar’s gate.
soso.string.4274: Come with me to the depths of the nest; I will attempt to revive him.
soso.string.4275: You’re back! Seeing you looked pensive, I left you there alone...
soso.string.4276: Before the Pope gave the key phrase, he seemed to glance at you... did you pick up something from the ancient capital？
soso.string.4277: In any case, that was a big help; now to reach the sanctum we only need to obtain the map of the Forest of Lost Paths.
soso.string.4278: From what you said, the map is currently in the hands of the stationed legion...
soso.string.4279: I will try to approach Biao Su in the capacity of a Holy‑Tree Church bishop; come along as well.
soso.string.4280: Alas, judging by your intel, the chance they will hand over the map is slim to none....
soso.string.4281: Besides this path, is it necessary to find other means....
soso.string.4282: I didn’t expect they would even drop the pretense....
soso.string.4283: I will protest to the Empire through my authority on this matter.
soso.string.4284: However, by then it may already be too late.
soso.string.4285: The forces entrenched here receiving mithril ore... and undead troops modified by the Sacred Tree’s mana will only grow stronger.
soso.string.4286: By then even the elite‑packed Imperial Royal Guard Knights may be unable to repel them...
